participant_1.background:
I have kids, and we enjoy spending time together.
I work during the day, spend my lunch break reading about puppy training and dog care, and then play rpg computer games at night.
i am in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
I have two passions: reading and riding my scooter.
i recently broke my leg.

participant_2.background:
I'm counting down the days to retirement and enjoying my singing time in the shower.
i m a college drop out.
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to love folk metal.
I want to spend more time with my grandchildren.
I like Drake's music, and my favorite color is blue.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, too! I just got back from a long day at work.
Oh, I bet you're tired! What do you do for work?
I'm a jazz musician, and I also play the saxophone in a band.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to be in a band when I was younger, but I had to quit because of work.
Oh, that's too bad! I'm glad you got to experience it, though.
Yeah, it was a lot of fun. What kind of music do you play?
We play mostly blues and jazz, but we also do some rock and roll.
That sounds really cool! I love blues and jazz.
Thanks! We have a show next weekend if you'd like to come.
Oh, I'd love to! What time is it?
It's at 7:00 pm at the local coffee shop.
